name: Dev Containers
description: Open any folder or repository inside a Docker container and take advantage of Visual Studio Code’s full feature set.

name: Remote - SSH
description: Open any folder on a remote machine using SSH and take advantage of VS Code's full feature set.

name: Remote Explorer
description: View remote machines for SSH and Tunnels.

name: Docker
description: Makes it easy to create, manage, and debug containerized applications.

name: Docker Explorer
description: Manage Docker Containers, Docker Images, and Docker Registries.

name: Python
description: Python language support with extension access points for IntelliSense (Pylance), Debugging, etc.

name: Pylance
description: A performant, feature-rich language server for Python in VS Code.

name: IntelliCode API Usage Examples
description: See relevant code examples from GitHub for over 100K different APIs right in your editor.

name: REST Client
description: REST Client for Visual Studio Code. Allows you to send HTTP requests and view responses directly.

name: Better Comments
description: Improve your code commenting by annotating with alert, info, TODOs, and more.
